titleStmt.title: Vindiciae vindiciarum, or, A further manifestation of M.J.C., his contradictions instanced in Vindiciae clavium being a rejoinder to his reply (to some few of those many contradictions) in his last book called, The way of Congregationall churches cleared, part 2 / by D.C.
titleStmt.author: Cawdrey, Daniel, 1588-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Christopher Meredith,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
